step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with closed fists and drawing your arms in. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms. Remember to exhale as you relax.
Great work on the arm extension and opening fingers. Ensure you are exhaling fully and relaxing the muscles.
You're doing well with the outward movement. Focus on maintaining shoulder height and a relaxed posture.
Nice return to the starting position. Ensure your fists are closed and muscles are tight for the next repetition.
Good start for the second repetition. Keep those fists closed and muscles tight as you inhale.
Well done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Remember to exhale and relax your muscles.
You're maintaining good form with the arm extension. Focus on a full exhale and muscle relaxation.
Great outward movement. Ensure your arms stay at shoulder height and your body remains relaxed.
Excellent finish! You returned to the start position. Remember to keep fists closed and muscles tight for the next set.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fists closed and muscles tight when inhaling, then open your fingers and relax as you exhale. Continue to extend your arms horizontally to shoulder height. Great work!
